ai-patthana7.3:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles consisting in thoughts.
ai-patthana7.3:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason for teaching. ...
ai-patthana7.3:2.1_0: not liable to be reborn in the underworld ...
ai-patthana7.3:3.1_0: Neither in the lower realms, nor by unreliable results arise in oneself.
ai-patthana7.3:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
